mapper.insert: insert into place_image (img_id, img_type, user_place_id, img_url) values (#{imgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userPlaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE place_image
user_place_id = #{placeId},
WHERE img_id IN
#{item}
mapper.select: SELECT up.user_place_id, up.customer_id, up.user_place_acreage, up.user_employee_num, up.user_owner_num, up.user_already_use, up.user_place_area, up.user_place_type, pi.img_id,pi.img_url,pi.img_type FROM user_place up LEFT JOIN place_image pi ON pi.user_place_id = up.user_place_id WHERE up.customer_id = #{customerId} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(0) FROM user_place up LEFT JOIN place_image pi ON pi.user_place_id = up.user_place_id WHERE up.customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT up.user_place_id, up.customer_id, up.user_place_acreage, up.user_employee_num, up.user_owner_num, up.user_already_use, up.user_place_area, up.user_place_type, pi.img_id,pi.img_url,pi.img_type FROM user_place up LEFT JOIN place_image pi ON pi.user_place_id = up.user_place_id WHERE up.user_place_id = #{placeId}
